snippet.title: Vampire Slave Trailer
snippet.description:
Vampire Slave: A Yaoi Visual Novel published by Y Press Games!
The world's most ancient vampire, an unprepared new leader of a centuries old vampire-hunting organization, thrust together by fate.  Thalos knows he's found his beloved, but Dusty must never let himself grow close to a vampire.  Play chapter 1 free on Steam!
